participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

SITE_ID.Description: Site at which data were acquired.

Levels.OLIN: Olin, Institute of Living at Hartford Hospital
Levels.PITT: University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine
Levels.SBL: Social Brain Lab, BCN NIC UMC Groningen, and Netherlands Institute for Neurosciences
Levels.UCLA_1: University of California, Los Angeles: Sample 1
Levels.UCLA_2: University of California, Los Angeles: Sample 2
Levels.USM: University of Utah School of Medicine

AGE_AT_SCAN.LongName: Age at time of scan in years

FIQ_TEST_TYPE.LongName: IQ Test Administered for Full Scale IQ

Levels.DAS_II_SA: Differential Ability Scales II - School age (DAS-II)
Levels.WISC_IV_4_SUBTESTS: Subtests of Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children (WISC-IV)
Levels.WISC_IV_FULL: The full Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children (WISC-IV)

VIQ_TEST_TYPE.LongName: IQ Test Administered for Verbal IQ

Levels.WISC_IV_FULL: The full Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children (WISC-IV)

PIQ_TEST_TYPE.LongName: IQ Test Administered for Performance IQ

Levels.WISC_IV_FULL: The full Wechsler Intelligence Scale for Children (WISC-IV)

ADI_R_SOCIAL_TOTAL A.LongName: Reciprocal Social Interaction subscore (A) Total for Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised

ADI_R_VERBAL_TOTAL_BV.LongName: Abnormalities in Communication Subscore (B) Total for Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised

ADI_R_RRB_TOTAL_C.LongName: Restricted, Repetitive, and Stereotyped Patterns of Behavior Subscore (C) Total for Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised

ADI_R_ONSET_TOTAL_D.LongName: Abnormality of Development Evident at or Before 36 Months Subscore (D) Total for Autism Diagnostic Interview-Revised

ADI_R_RSRCH_RELIABLE.LongName: Was ADI scored and administered by research reliable personnel?

ADOS_TOTAL.LongName: Classic Total ADOS Score (Communication subscore + Social Interaction subscore)

ADOS_COMM.LongName: Communication Total Subscore of the Classic ADOS

ADOS_SOCIAL.LongName: Social Total Subscore of the Classic ADOS

ADOS_STEREO_BEHAV.LongName: Sterotyped Behaviors and Rerstricted Interests Total Subscore of the Classic ADOS

ADOS_RSRCH_RELIABLE.LongName: Was ADOS scored and administered by research reliable personnel?

ADOS_GOTHAM_SOC_AFFECT.LongName: Social Affect Total Subscore for Gotham Algorithm of the ADOS

ADOS_GOTHAM_RRB.LongName: Restricted and Repetitive Behaviors Total Subscore for Gotham Algorithm of the ADOS

ADOS_GOTHAM_TOTAL.LongName: Social Affect Total + Restricted and Repetitive Behaviors Total

ADOS_GOTHAM_SEVERITY.LongName: Individually Calibrated Severity Score for Gotham Algorithm of the ADOS

SRS_RAW_TOTAL.LongName: Total Raw Score the Social Responsiveness Scale

SRS_AWARENESS.LongName: Social Responsiveness Scale Social Awareness Subscore Raw Total

SRS_COGNITION.LongName: Social Responsiveness Scale Social Cognition Subscore Raw Total

SRS_COMMUNICATION.LongName: Social Responsiveness Scale Social Communication Subscore Raw Total

SRS_MOTIVATION.LongName: Social Responsiveness Scale Social Motivation Subscore Raw Total

SRS_MANNERISMS.LongName: Social Responsiveness Scale Autistic Mannerisms Subscore Raw Total

AQ_TOTAL.LongName: Total Raw Score of the Autism Quotient

MEDICATION_NAME.LongName: Active ingredient of any current psychoactive medications

OFF_STIMULANTS_AT_SCAN.LongName: Off stimulants 24 hours prior to scan?

VINELAND_EXPRESSIVE_V_SCALED.LongName: Vineland Adaptive Behavior Scales Expressive Language V Scaled Score

VINELAND_DAILYLVNG_STANDARD.LongName: Vineland Adaptive Behavior Scales Daily Living Skills Standard Score
